title: Can the UN ever become irrelevant to the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is irreverent already to the world. A completely dysfunctional organization that's staffed with overpaid Uncrats living on fine silk and exorbitant expense accounts while delivering zero value to the world citizens it's supposed to represent. Laughs able committees such as Human Rights and headed by countries such as Syria and Iran ice the cake for its laughing stock effectiveness. In the unlikely event that Trump is elected, he should evict the UN from its digs in NY, for the simple reason it's not the “highest & best use” of the property for Americans As a property dude - he would get that concept in spades

I don't Know If you are Living in the same World as me, But the UN has always Been Irrelevant. At the most, It assuages the fears of Weaker nations and Makes it easier for the Power blocks of the world to Interact and Engage in Power posturing.
Dude it already has !! More than decade a ago
